definition: a danger concealed within sth/hidden damage/misfortune not visible from the surface
to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to contain in a concealed form/to keep covered up/implicit
to hide oneself/invisible (person or online status)

sentences.english: Opportunity often comes disguised in the form of misfortune, or temporary defeat.
sentences.chinese: 机会经常隐臧在不幸煳暂时的失败中。

sentences.english: The present research explored the interrelation of implicit learning and explicit learning.
sentences.chinese: 对内隐与外显学习过程的相互作用进行了探讨。

sentences.english: The small round blue organisms at the lumenal border are cryptosporidia.
sentences.chinese: 在内腔边界的小圆兰色的生物体是隐孢子虫。

sentences.english: But feudalism ideology hides actually by one remaining form.
sentences.chinese: 但封建主义思想意识却以一种残余的形式隐躲下来。

sentences.english: The PCR was of Cryptosporidium specificity .
sentences.chinese: 建立的PCR具有隐孢子虫属特异性。

sentences.english: but on Cain and his offering he did not look with favor.
sentences.chinese: 只是看不中该隐和他的供物。
“隐”与“翩”这两个字颇有点朦胧的味道。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathogenesis of cryptosporidium and cryptosporidiosis prevalence in Qingdao area.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨隐孢子虫在青岛地区的发病情况及其致病性。

sentences.english: The study also showed that IAT-aggression might be a valid measurement of aggression.
sentences.chinese: 本研究支持了IAT测量个体内隐攻击性的有效性。

sentences.english: These results demonstrated that three cryptochrome genes are involved in the promotion of flowering time in rice.
sentences.chinese: 说明三个隐花色素基因都具有促进水稻开花的作用。

sentences.english: Cerebrospinal fluid(CSF)microscopically and culture showed presence of cryptococcus neoformans.
sentences.chinese: 脑脊液显微镜下及培养均存在新型隐球菌。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the research of image recognition based on the hidden Markov model.
sentences.chinese: 本文基于隐马尔可夫模型进行图像识别问题的研究。

sentences.english: And David went up from there and lived in the strongholds of En Gedi.
sentences.chinese: 大卫从那里上去，住在隐基底的山寨里。

sentences.english: If anyone kills Cain, Cain shall be avenged sevenfold.
sentences.chinese: 任何人如果杀了该隐，该隐可以七倍奉还。

sentences.english: Such infections include pulmonary tuberculosis and cryptococcal meningitis.
sentences.chinese: 这些感染包括肺结核和隐球菌脑膜炎等。

sentences.english: Human retinas have the protein cryptochrome, used for magnetic navigation in some species.
sentences.chinese: 在某些物种体内，隐花色素蛋白主要用于磁场导航。

definition: remote/hidden away/secluded/serene/peaceful/to imprison/in superstition indicates the underworld/ancient district spanning Liaonang and Hebei provinces
